sell(Scanner) - Method in class CommandLine.Shop
Takes user input to sell an item - items in the player's inventory are printed, and the player enters a number correlating to the item they want to sell and calculates the sell back price based on the items current usage, then the item is removed from the player's inventory and the player's gold is increased by the sell back price
sellbackPrice - Variable in class CommandLine.Item
purchasePrice how much gold it costs the player to buy the item sellbackPrice starts as the same as the purchasePrice, decreases proportionaly as item is used.
sellbackPrice - Variable in class GUI.Item
purchasePrice how much gold it costs the player to buy the item sellbackPrice starts as the same as the purchasePrice, decreases progressively as item is used.
